name: Honkai Impact 3rd: Undine's Phantasm
storyline: To retrieve the lost Gem of Desire, Bronya threw herself headfirst into the unpredictable Sea of Quanta. In this bizarre realm beyond human comprehension, a most unexpected figure showed up before her...
summary:
Version 3.2 of Honkai Impact 3rd, which includes:
• New Valkyrie: Swallowtail Phantasm (Seele)
• New ELF: Selune's Elegy
• New Story Chapter XI: Deep End of the Sea
• New Animated Short: Cyberangel: ZERO Exception
• New Featured Event: Summer Imaginary Maze
• ...and more!

videos.name: Cinematic Trailer
videos.title: Cyberangel: ZERO Exception - Japanese dub Version - Honkai Impact 3rd
